channel.title: Could I get in any Trouble for this?
channel.description: So I had a server, and a webclient, and a whole bunch of stuff, and my hoster fucked me over and hacked and stole everything. So I hacked into the nulled vBulletin website he has and went chaotic on the website and fucked everything up. And some guy said he can suit me. Is this true? Thanks for the help
